metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10888 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in libgit2 before version 0.27.3. A missing check ingit_delta_apply function in delta.c file, may lead to an out-of-bound readwhile reading a binary delta file. An attacker may use this flaw to cause aDenial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10888` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-0 - 0.19.0-2ubuntu0.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-2ubuntu0.4').
